Hold your hand out, you silly girl

This either refers to an old song called “Hold Your Hand Out, Naughty Boy,” or the punishment of hand-slapping.

Listen to the song here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PtWC5L1sXt8

Furthermore, considering this song is about McCartney’s dog, Martha, it would seem that Paul is asking her to “shake.”
We all love our pets, but the British have taken it to the highest level, to the point of obsession. Nothing wrong with it.
